params.tabheader: <ietext><text><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 12px; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"> <P align=center><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Tahoma"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 14px"><B><SPAN style="COLOR: #008080">Contents</SPAN></SPAN></B></SPAN></P></SPAN></text><hyperlinks></hyperlinks></ietext>
params.msg: You cannot jump to this slide until you visit previous slides

object.export_content:
Help

eLearning Module Structure

Learning Module is a fundamental building block of the Course hierarchy representing the set of author-structured Slides. During the learning process the learner is led from one Slide to another sequentially, which is default behavior.
Slide (Interactive page) is the main building block of Learning Module. Slides are used by the author to place learning material, tests, and exercises. The order of Slide correlation is predefined by the author.

Navigation

eLearning Module navigation controls (the list may vary depending on author's design):

  • "Prev" and "Next" buttons enable to jump on previous and next slide correspondingly; 
  • "Replay" button enable to start current slide once again from the beginning (it may be useful, for example, to repeat animation on slide etc.);
  • "Contents" tab or button with popup window displays the list of all slides and enables transition to any slide in the Module (if no restrictions were applied by author);
  • Navigation drop-down menu displays the list of all slides and enables transition to any slide in the Module (if no restrictions were applied by author);
  • "Sound On/Off" button toggles narration (if narration exists in the Module);
  • "Close Module" button closes Module window.

Please note that some controls may become disabled while navigating. Usually it means that:

  • not all objects of current slide are displayed yet (depending on rules defined by author);
  • not all activities required from learner on current slide are finished (for example, navigation controls may be disabled until question is answered etc.);
  • navigation action is just impossible (for example, there's no slides previous to first one).

params.tabheader: <ietext><text><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 12px; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"> <P align=center><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Tahoma"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 14px"><B><SPAN style="COLOR: #008080">Help</SPAN></B></SPAN></SPAN></P></SPAN></text><hyperlinks></hyperlinks></ietext>
params.tabtext:
<ietext><text><TABLE style="FONT-SIZE: 11px; FONT-FAMILY: Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" cellSpacing=0 cellPadding=4 width="100%" border=0>
<TBODY>
<TR>
<TD vAlign=top align=middle width=15 bgColor=#f0f0f0><IMG height=7 src="[!MODULE_IMAGES]contents_bullet_1.gif" width=7 vspace=4 border=0> </TD>
<TD bgColor=#f0f0f0><B>eLearning Module Structure</B></TD></TR></TBODY></TABLE>
<TABLE style="FONT-SIZE: 11px; FONT-FAMILY: Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" cellSpacing=2 cellPadding=4 width="100%" border=0>
<TBODY>
<TR>
<TD>
<P>Learning Module is a fundamental building block of the Course hierarchy representing the set of author-structured Slides. During the learning process the learner is led from one Slide to another sequentially, which is default behavior. <BR>Slide (Interactive page) is the main building block of Learning Module. Slides are used by the author to place learning material, tests, and exercises. The order of Slide correlation is predefined by the author. </P></TD></TR></TBODY></TABLE>
<TABLE style="FONT-SIZE: 11px; FONT-FAMILY: Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" cellSpacing=0 cellPadding=4 width="100%" border=0>
<TBODY>
<TR>
<TD vAlign=top align=middle width=15 bgColor=#f0f0f0><IMG height=7 src="[!MODULE_IMAGES]contents_bullet_1.gif" width=7 vspace=4 border=0> </TD>
<TD bgColor=#f0f0f0><B>Navigation</B></TD></TR></TBODY></TABLE>
<TABLE style="FONT-SIZE: 11px; FONT-FAMILY: Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" cellSpacing=2 cellPadding=4 width="100%" border=0>
<TBODY>
<TR>
<TD>
<P>eLearning Module navigation controls (the list may vary depending on author's design):</P>
<UL>
<LI>"Prev" and "Next" buttons enable to jump on previous and next slide correspondingly;&nbsp; 
<LI>"Replay" button enable to start current slide&nbsp;once again from the beginning (it may be useful, for example, to repeat animation on slide etc.); 
<LI>"Contents" tab or button with popup window displays the list of all slides and enables transition to any slide in the Module&nbsp;(if no&nbsp;restrictions were applied by author); 
<LI>Navigation drop-down menu displays the list of all slides and enables transition to any slide in the Module&nbsp;(if no&nbsp;restrictions were applied by author); 
<LI>"Sound On/Off" button&nbsp;toggles narration (if narration exists in the Module); 
<LI>"Close Module" button closes Module window.</LI></UL>
<P>Please note that some controls may become disabled while navigating. Usually it means that:</P>
<UL>
<LI>not all objects of&nbsp;current slide are displayed yet (depending on rules defined by author); 
<LI>not all activities required from learner on current slide&nbsp;are finished (for example, navigation controls may be disabled until question is answered etc.); 
<LI>navigation action is just impossible (for example, there's no slides previous to first one).</LI></UL>
<P>&nbsp;</P></TD></TR></TBODY></TABLE></text><hyperlinks></hyperlinks></ietext>

object.content: <ietext><text><P><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 18px; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><SPAN style="COLOR: #deffff">Курс по дипломной работе</SPAN></P> <P><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 12px; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 18px"><SPAN style="COLOR: #deffff">Магнитовой М.</SPAN></SPAN></SPAN></SPAN></P></text><hyperlinks></hyperlinks></ietext>

<ietext><text><P align=center><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 24px; FONT-FAMILY: Arial; COLOR: #000000"><B>Исследование критериев оценки веб-ресурса поисковыми системами</B></SPAN></P></text><hyperlinks></hyperlinks></ietext>
<ietext><text><P><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 18px; FONT-FAMILY: Arial; COLOR: #000000">Университет ИТМО, Магистерская программа Веб-технологии</SPAN></P></text><hyperlinks></hyperlinks></ietext>
<ietext><text><P align=center><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 18px; FONT-FAMILY: Arial; COLOR: #000000">Магнитова Мария Владимировна</SPAN></P></text><hyperlinks></hyperlinks></ietext>

<ietext><text><P><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 12px; FONT-FAMILY: Arial; COLOR: #000000"><FONT size=3 face="Times New Roman"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 18px; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"></FONT>&nbsp;</P>
<UL>
<LI>
<DIV style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; unicode-bidi: embed; WORD-BREAK: normal; DIRECTION: ltr; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-LEFT: 0.38in; MARGIN-TOP: 5.76pt; TEXT-INDENT: -0.38in; language: ru; mso-line-break-override: none; punctuation-wrap: hanging"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 20px; COLOR: #000000">Робот<SPAN style="mso-spacerun: yes">&nbsp; </SPAN>(<SPAN style="language: ru; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-color-index: 1; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt">robot</SPAN><SPAN style="language: ru; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-color-index: 1; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt">) </SPAN></DIV>
<LI>
<DIV style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; unicode-bidi: embed; WORD-BREAK: normal; DIRECTION: ltr; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-LEFT: 0.38in; MARGIN-TOP: 5.76pt; TEXT-INDENT: -0.38in; language: ru; mso-line-break-override: none; punctuation-wrap: hanging"><SPAN style="language: ru; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-color-index: 1; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt">Поисковая база данных (</SPAN><SPAN style="language: ru; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-color-index: 1; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt">index</SPAN><SPAN style="language: ru; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-color-index: 1; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt"> </SPAN><SPAN style="language: ru; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-color-index: 1; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt">database</SPAN><SPAN style="language: ru; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-color-index: 1; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt">) </SPAN></DIV>
<LI>
<DIV style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; unicode-bidi: embed; WORD-BREAK: normal; DIRECTION: ltr; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-LEFT: 0.38in; MARGIN-TOP: 5.76pt; TEXT-INDENT: -0.38in; language: ru; mso-line-break-override: none; punctuation-wrap: hanging"><SPAN style="language: ru; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-color-index: 1; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt">Клиент</SPAN></DIV>
<LI>
<DIV style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; unicode-bidi: embed; WORD-BREAK: normal; DIRECTION: ltr; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-LEFT: 0.38in; MARGIN-TOP: 5.76pt; TEXT-INDENT: -0.38in; language: ru; mso-line-break-override: none; punctuation-wrap: hanging"><SPAN style="language: ru; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-color-index: 1; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt">Поисковая система </SPAN></DIV>
<LI>
<DIV style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; unicode-bidi: embed; WORD-BREAK: normal; DIRECTION: ltr; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-LEFT: 0.38in; MARGIN-TOP: 5.76pt; TEXT-INDENT: -0.38in; language: ru; mso-line-break-override: none; punctuation-wrap: hanging"><SPAN style="language: ru; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-color-index: 1; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt">Релевантность поисковой выдачи</SPAN></DIV>
<LI>
<DIV style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; unicode-bidi: embed; WORD-BREAK: normal; DIRECTION: ltr; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-LEFT: 0.38in; MARGIN-TOP: 5.76pt; TEXT-INDENT: -0.38in; language: ru; mso-line-break-override: none; punctuation-wrap: hanging"><SPAN style="language: ru; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-color-index: 1; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt">Пертинентность поисковой выдачи</SPAN></DIV>
<LI>
<DIV style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; unicode-bidi: embed; WORD-BREAK: normal; DIRECTION: ltr; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-LEFT: 0.38in; MARGIN-TOP: 5.76pt; TEXT-INDENT: -0.38in; language: ru; mso-line-break-override: none; punctuation-wrap: hanging"><SPAN style="language: ru; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-color-index: 1; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt">Информационный шум</SPAN></DIV>
<LI>
<DIV style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; unicode-bidi: embed; WORD-BREAK: normal; DIRECTION: ltr; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-LEFT: 0.38in; MARGIN-TOP: 5.76pt; TEXT-INDENT: -0.38in; language: ru; mso-line-break-override: none; punctuation-wrap: hanging">Информационные потери</SPAN></SPAN></DIV></LI></UL></SPAN></text><hyperlinks></hyperlinks></ietext>

<ietext><text><P><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 20px; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial">Согласно ГОСТ 7.73-96: «<B>релевантный</B>: соответствие полученной информации информационному запросу». Таким образом, релевантность определяется исключительно математическими моделями поиска конкретной поисковой системы. </SPAN></P> <P><FONT face="Times New Roman"><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial">В том же ГОСТ говорится: «пертинентность; <B>пертинентный</B>: соответствие полученной информации информационной потребности», т. е. пертинентность определяет степень соответствия между ожиданиями пользователя и результатами работы поисковой системы по данному запросу.</SPAN></SPAN></FONT></P></text><hyperlinks></hyperlinks></ietext>

<ietext><text><OL>
<LI><SPAN style="COLOR: #000000"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 24px; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">Индексация <SPAN style="language: ru; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-color-index: 1; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt">веб-ресурсов</SPAN><SPAN style="language: ru; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-color-index: 1; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt"> </SPAN></SPAN></SPAN></LI>
<LI><SPAN style="COLOR: #000000"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 24px; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><SPAN style="language: ru; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-color-index: 1; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt"></SPAN><SPAN style="COLOR: #000000; language: ru; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-color-index: 1; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt">«Понимание» запроса пользователя</SPAN></SPAN></SPAN></LI>
<LI><SPAN style="COLOR: #000000"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 24px; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><SPAN style="COLOR: #000000; language: ru; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-color-index: 1; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt"></SPAN><SPAN style="COLOR: #000000"><SPAN style="language: ru; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-color-index: 1; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt">Формирование релевантной (</SPAN><SPAN style="language: ru; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-color-index: 1; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt">пертинентной</SPAN><SPAN style="language: ru; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-color-index: 1; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt">) поисковой выдачи</SPAN> </SPAN></SPAN></SPAN></LI></OL></text><hyperlinks></hyperlinks></ietext>

<ietext><text><P><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 12px; FONT-FAMILY: Arial; COLOR: #000000"><FONT size=3 face="Times New Roman"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 18px; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"></FONT>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; unicode-bidi: embed; WORD-BREAK: normal; DIRECTION: ltr; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-LEFT: 0.38in; MARGIN-TOP: 5.76pt; TEXT-INDENT: -0.38in; language: ru; mso-line-break-override: none; punctuation-wrap: hanging" align=center><SPAN style="COLOR: #000000">Процесс<SPAN style="language: en-US; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-color-index: 1; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt"> </SPAN><SPAN style="language: en-US; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-color-index: 1; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt">индексирования</SPAN><SPAN style="language: en-US; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-color-index: 1; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt"> </SPAN><SPAN style="language: en-US; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-color-index: 1; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt">сайтов</SPAN><SPAN style="language: en-US; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-color-index: 1; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt"> </SPAN><SPAN style="language: en-US; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-color-index: 1; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt">поисковой</SPAN><SPAN style="language: ru; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-color-index: 1; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt"> </SPAN><SPAN style="language: en-US; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-color-index: 1; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt">системой</SPAN><SPAN style="language: ru; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-color-index: 1; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt"> </SPAN></P>
<P style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; unicode-bidi: embed; WORD-BREAK: normal; DIRECTION: ltr; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-LEFT: 0.38in; MARGIN-TOP: 5.76pt; TEXT-INDENT: -0.38in; language: ru; mso-line-break-override: none; punctuation-wrap: hanging" align=center><SPAN style="language: en-US; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-color-index: 1; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt">осуществляется</SPAN><SPAN style="language: en-US; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-color-index: 1; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt"> с </SPAN><SPAN style="language: en-US; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-color-index: 1; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt">некоторой</SPAN><SPAN style="language: ru; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-color-index: 1; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt"> </SPAN><SPAN style="language: ru; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-color-index: 1; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt">п</SPAN><SPAN style="language: en-US; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-color-index: 1; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt">ериодичностью</SPAN><SPAN style="language: ru; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-color-index: 1; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt">.</SPAN></P>
<P style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; unicode-bidi: embed; WORD-BREAK: normal; DIRECTION: ltr; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-LEFT: 0.38in; MARGIN-TOP: 5.76pt; TEXT-INDENT: -0.38in; language: ru; mso-line-break-override: none; punctuation-wrap: hanging" align=center><SPAN style="language: ru; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-color-index: 1; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt"></SPAN>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; unicode-bidi: embed; WORD-BREAK: normal; DIRECTION: ltr; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-LEFT: 0.38in; MARGIN-TOP: 5.76pt; TEXT-INDENT: -0.38in; language: ru; mso-line-break-override: none; punctuation-wrap: hanging" align=center></P>
<P style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; unicode-bidi: embed; WORD-BREAK: normal; DIRECTION: ltr; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-LEFT: 0.38in; MARGIN-TOP: 5.76pt; TEXT-INDENT: -0.38in; language: ru; mso-line-break-override: none; punctuation-wrap: hanging" align=center><SPAN style="language: ru; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-color-index: 1; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt">В процессе индексации формируется специальным образом</SPAN></P>
<P style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; unicode-bidi: embed; WORD-BREAK: normal; DIRECTION: ltr; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-LEFT: 0.38in; MARGIN-TOP: 5.76pt; TEXT-INDENT: -0.38in; language: ru; mso-line-break-override: none; punctuation-wrap: hanging" align=center><SPAN style="language: ru; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-color-index: 1; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt">организованная БД,<SPAN style="mso-spacerun: yes">&nbsp; </SPAN>содержащая лексические единицы</SPAN></P>
<P style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; unicode-bidi: embed; WORD-BREAK: normal; DIRECTION: ltr; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-LEFT: 0.38in; MARGIN-TOP: 5.76pt; TEXT-INDENT: -0.38in; language: ru; mso-line-break-override: none; punctuation-wrap: hanging" align=center><SPAN style="language: ru; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-color-index: 1; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt">проиндексированных </SPAN><SPAN style="language: ru; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-color-index: 1; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt">веб-документов</SPAN><SPAN style="language: ru; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-color-index: 1; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt"> и другую информацию</SPAN></P>
<P style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; unicode-bidi: embed; WORD-BREAK: normal; DIRECTION: ltr; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-LEFT: 0.38in; MARGIN-TOP: 5.76pt; TEXT-INDENT: -0.38in; language: ru; mso-line-break-override: none; punctuation-wrap: hanging" align=center>о лексемах (в т.ч. их позиция в документах).</SPAN></SPAN></P></SPAN></text><hyperlinks></hyperlinks></ietext>

<ietext><text><P><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 12px; FONT-FAMILY: Arial; COLOR: #000000"><FONT size=3 face="Times New Roman"></FONT>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; unicode-bidi: embed; WORD-BREAK: normal; DIRECTION: ltr; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-LEFT: 0.38in; MARGIN-TOP: 5.76pt; TEXT-INDENT: -0.38in; language: ru; mso-line-break-override: none; punctuation-wrap: hanging"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 20px; COLOR: #000000">Средняя длина запроса сегодня = <SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Calibri; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; language: ru; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt">3 слова</SPAN></SPAN></P>
<P style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; unicode-bidi: embed; WORD-BREAK: normal; DIRECTION: ltr; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-LEFT: 0.38in; MARGIN-TOP: 5.76pt; TEXT-INDENT: -0.38in; language: ru; mso-line-break-override: none; punctuation-wrap: hanging"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 20px; COLOR: #000000">&nbsp;</P>

<P style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; unicode-bidi: embed; WORD-BREAK: normal; DIRECTION: ltr; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-LEFT: 0.38in; MARGIN-TOP: 5.76pt; TEXT-INDENT: -0.38in; language: ru; mso-line-break-override: none; punctuation-wrap: hanging"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 20px; FONT-FAMILY: Calibri; language: ru; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt; mso-color-index: 1"><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial">О</SPAN><SPAN style="language: en-US; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt; mso-color-index: 1">дн</SPAN><SPAN style="language: ru; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt; mso-color-index: 1">а </SPAN><SPAN style="language: en-US; <P style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; unicode-bidi: embed; WORD-BREAK: normal; DIRECTION: ltr; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-LEFT: 0.38in; MARGIN-TOP: 5.76pt; TEXT-INDENT: -0.38in; language: ru; mso-line-break-override: none; punctuation-wrap: hanging">(зачастую 1 слово) и особенностями естественного языка</SPAN></P>
<P style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; unicode-bidi: embed; WORD-BREAK: normal; DIRECTION: ltr; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-LEFT: 0.38in; MARGIN-TOP: 5.76pt; TEXT-INDENT: -0.38in; language: ru; mso-line-break-override: none; punctuation-wrap: hanging"><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial">(синонимия, многозначность).</SPAN></SPAN></P></SPAN></text><hyperlinks></hyperlinks></ietext>

<ietext><text><P><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 12px; FONT-FAMILY: Arial; COLOR: #000000"><FONT size=3 face="Times New Roman"></FONT>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; unicode-bidi: embed; WORD-BREAK: normal; DIRECTION: ltr; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-LEFT: 0.38in; MARGIN-TOP: 5.76pt; TEXT-INDENT: -0.38in; language: ru; mso-line-break-override: none; punctuation-wrap: hanging"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 20px; COLOR: #000000">Получил<SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Calibri; FONT-VARIANT: normal; TEXT-TRANSFORM: none; FONT-WEIGHT: normal; FONT-STYLE: normal; LETTER-SPACING: 0pt; language: ru; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-color-index: 1; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt; mso-no-proof: no"></SPAN><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial">и широкое распространение <SPAN style="language: ru; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-color-index: 1; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt">теории и методы</SPAN></P>
<P style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; unicode-bidi: embed; WORD-BREAK: normal; DIRECTION: ltr; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-LEFT: 0.38in; MARGIN-TOP: 5.76pt; TEXT-INDENT: -0.38in; language: ru; mso-line-break-override: none; punctuation-wrap: hanging"><SPAN style="language: ru; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-color-index: 1; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt">семантических сетей, </SPAN><SPAN style="language: ru; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-color-index: 1; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt">контент-анализа</SPAN><SPAN style="language: ru; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-color-index: 1; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt"> и глубинного анализа</SPAN></P>
<P style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; unicode-bidi: embed; WORD-BREAK: normal; DIRECTION: ltr; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-LEFT: 0.38in; MARGIN-TOP: 5.76pt; TEXT-INDENT: -0.38in; language: ru; mso-line-break-override: none; punctuation-wrap: hanging"><SPAN style="language: ru; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-color-index: 1; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt">текстов (</SPAN><SPAN style="language: ru; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-color-index: 1; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt">TextMining</SPAN>)</SPAN><SPAN style="mso-spacerun: yes">&nbsp; </SPAN>и др.</SPAN></P>
<P style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; unicode-bidi: embed; WORD-BREAK: normal; DIRECTION: ltr; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-LEFT: 0.38in; MARGIN-TOP: 5.76pt; TEXT-INDENT: -0.38in; language: ru; mso-line-break-override: none; punctuation-wrap: hanging"></P></SPAN></text><hyperlinks></hyperlinks></ietext>

<DIV style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; unicode-bidi: embed; WORD-BREAK: normal; DIRECTION: ltr; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-LEFT: 0.38in; MARGIN-TOP: 5.28pt; TEXT-INDENT: -0.38in; language: ru; mso-line-break-override: none; punctuation-wrap: hanging" align=left><SPAN style="language: ru; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-color-index: 1; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt">С ноября 2009г. </SPAN><SPAN style="language: en-US; <ietext><text><UL>
<LI><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 12px; FONT-FAMILY: Arial; COLOR: #000000"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 20px; FONT-FAMILY: Arial; COLOR: #000000"><SPAN style="language: ru; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-color-index: 1; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt">Количество слов из запроса в содержимом документа</SPAN></SPAN></SPAN></LI>
<LI><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 12px; FONT-FAMILY: Arial; COLOR: #000000"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 20px; FONT-FAMILY: Arial; COLOR: #000000"><SPAN style="language: ru; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-color-index: 1; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt"></SPAN><SPAN style="language: ru; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-color-index: 1; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt">Элементы (теги), в которых эти слова располагаются (теги заголовков, поля МЕТА и т.п.)</SPAN></SPAN></SPAN></LI>
<LI><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 12px; FONT-FAMILY: Arial; COLOR: #000000"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 20px; FONT-FAMILY: Arial; COLOR: #000000"><SPAN style="language: ru; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-color-index: 1; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt"></SPAN><SPAN style="language: ru; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-color-index: 1; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt">Местоположение искомых слов в документе</SPAN></SPAN></SPAN></LI>
<LI><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 12px; FONT-FAMILY: Arial; COLOR: #000000"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 20px; FONT-FAMILY: Arial; COLOR: #000000"><SPAN style="language: ru; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-color-index: 1; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt"></SPAN>Удельный вес слов (относительная частота)</SPAN></LI></UL></SPAN></text><hyperlinks></hyperlinks></ietext>

<ietext><text><UL>
<LI><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 12px; FONT-FAMILY: Arial; COLOR: #000000"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 20px; COLOR: #000000"><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Calibri; language: ru; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-color-index: 1; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt">«Время жизни» веб-ресурса –<SPAN style="mso-spacerun: yes">&nbsp; </SPAN>как долго веб-ресурс находится в базе поискового сервера</SPAN></SPAN></SPAN></LI>
<LI><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 12px; FONT-FAMILY: Arial; COLOR: #000000"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 20px; COLOR: #000000"><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Calibri; language: ru; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-color-index: 1; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt"></SPAN><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Calibri; language: ru; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-color-index: 1; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt">Тематический индекс цитируемости (ТИЦ) – как много ссылок на данный документ идет с других </SPAN><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Calibri; language: ru; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-color-index: 1; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt">веб-ресурсов</SPAN><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Calibri; language: ru; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-color-index: 1; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt"> </SPAN></SPAN></SPAN></LI>
<LI><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 12px; FONT-FAMILY: Arial; COLOR: #000000"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 20px; COLOR: #000000"><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Calibri; language: ru; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-color-index: 1; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt"></SPAN><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Calibri; language: en-US; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-color-index: 1; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt">Индекс</SPAN><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Calibri; language: en-US; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-color-index: 1; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt"> </SPAN><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Calibri; language: en-US; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-color-index: 1; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt">популярности</SPAN><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Calibri; language: en-US; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-color-index: 1; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt"> – </SPAN><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Calibri; language: en-US; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-color-index: 1; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt">как</SPAN><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Calibri; language: en-US; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-color-index: 1; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt"> </SPAN><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Calibri; language: en-US; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; mso-bidi-font-family: +mn-cs; mso-color-index: 1; mso-font-kerning: 12.0pt">часто</SPAN><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Calibri; language: en-US; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-font-family: +mn-ea; item.q_question: <ietext><text><P><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 12px; FONT-FAMILY: Arial; COLOR: #000000"><SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial">Определение "соответствие полученной информации информационной потребности" относится к понятию:</SPAN></SPAN></P></text><hyperlinks></hyperlinks></ietext>

<ietext><text><P><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 12px; FONT-FAMILY: Arial; COLOR: #000000">Выберите верную последовательность основного подхода работы поисковой системы:</SPAN></P></text><hyperlinks></hyperlinks></ietext>

item.q_variant: <ietext><text><P><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 12px; FONT-FAMILY: Arial; COLOR: #000000">Индексация, "понимание" запроса, формирование поисковой выдачи</SPAN></P></text><hyperlinks></hyperlinks></ietext>
<ietext><text><P><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 12px; FONT-FAMILY: Arial; COLOR: #000000">Формирование поисковой выдачи, "понимание" запроса, индексация</SPAN></P></text><hyperlinks></hyperlinks></ietext>
